overview: Erotic comedy in three episodes: Segment 1- Erotic Dream: Sonia, a totally insecure woman, in one of her erotic dreams, sits in a harem, satisfying her most violent and strange desires. She wakes up wet, as if she's coming out of an orgasm. Segment 2- Horn Changed: Navarro, eccentric millionaire, decides to invite his friends to dinner. All guests are required to bring their wives. After dinner, the dessert is a plate with a key. The ladies retreat to their rooms waiting for their pair. But the host changes the keys and the wives end up having sex with other men.
title: Erotic Things II
